name: Wave Hero
overview: In this game, you are in a boat/water craft and the goal is to beat your personal best time. However, there are huge rocks, so you have to dive under the water and jump up to clear the rocks. Make sure your timing is correct though, because if you don't you will crash into the rocks. Created by Geir Straume for the 2018 Reset64 4K 'Craptastic' Game Competition. This game tied for third place.
